ygData.subject: RE: Newbie bard race to 12 (was [eqbards] Re: Newbie Bard needs h unting suggestions)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh, by last night I either meant last thursday or next week , I can t remember which :o) In fact *puts on Arcane Cap of Linear Time Perception* it was
ygData.messageBody:
> > No kidding. Newbie bard made level 12 last night in Kurn's
> > Tower! Woot!
>
> Err, Sunday night, right? What time Sunday night? I hit it
> at 8:00ish EST.
> Did I beat you too???

Oh, by "last night" I either meant "last thursday" or "next week", I can't
remember which :o) In fact *puts on Arcane Cap of Linear Time Perception* it
was about, oh, 11pm EST, so you win! :o)

I have decided I cannot stand monotonic ouvre of Kurns Tower much longer and
returned to FV (including amazing cliff dive and hair raising Corpse
Recovery)only to find it SNOWING. It was really pretty, though oddly there
was no accumulation :o) I took a peek at the Lake of Ill Omen and decided my
time is probaly now best spent elsewhere, so, off to Unrest! Thanks again
everyone for all the suggestions.

Tsengu/Tszaaz



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
